message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $20,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your perspective on the value of the product, but I believe I can offer a more reasonable price. How about $18,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product.  While $20,000 is my ideal price, I'm willing to come down to $19,000 to find a good compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget, how about we settle on $17,000?
Bob, I'm trying to find a middle ground here. $18,500 is my final offer. I believe this price reflects the true value of the product.
I understand your position, Alice. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose $18,000 as a final offer.
